summary: A fairy tale-like love story between young circus artist Lola and the bear Misha, who one day transforms into a human.
cast: Rebecka Liljeberg|Joachim Król|Sergey Bodrov|Keith Allen|Maurizio Donadoni|Anne-Marie Pisani|Marcela Musso|Ariadna Gil|Silvio Orlando|Yuri Aleksandrov|Natalya Aleksandrova|Thomas Arnold|Aleksandr Bashirov|Paul Berrondo|Michael Bornhöter|Petra Gerhardt|Henric Holmberg|Antonia Jimenez|Natalia Kroukova|Werner Kwoll|Natasha Logvinova|Tibu Lubart|Kim Melander|Dmitri Ojguibessov|Maria Orlova|Piet Paes|Juan Parrilla|Ivan Mathias Petersson|Kirill Pletnyov|Pavel Polunin|Guido Schick|Juan Tejero|David Visone
title: El beso del oso
